trans-unit.source: Computes a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA512" /> hash function.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA512" /> 哈希函数计算基于哈希值的消息验证代码 (HMAC)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512> is a type of keyed hash algorithm that is constructed from the SHA-512 hash function and used as a Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512> 是一种构造从 sha-512 哈希函数并用作基于哈希的消息身份验证代码 (hmac) 的加密哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The HMAC process mixes a secret key with the message data and hashes the result.
trans-unit.target: HMAC 过程将机密密钥混合与消息数据，并进行哈希运算结果。

trans-unit.source: The hash value is mixed with the secret key again, and then hashed a second time.
trans-unit.target: 哈希值是同样，混合的机密密钥，然后进行第二次哈希处理。

trans-unit.source: The output hash is 512 bits in length.
trans-unit.target: 输出哈希值为 512 位的长度。

trans-unit.source: An HMAC can be used to determine whether a message sent over a nonsecure channel has been tampered with, provided that the sender and receiver share a secret key.
trans-unit.target: HMAC 可以用于确定是否通过非安全通道发送的消息已被篡改，前提是发送方和接收方共享机密密钥。

trans-unit.source: The sender computes the hash value for the original data and sends both the original data and hash value as a single message.
trans-unit.target: 发件人计算原始数据的哈希值，并将原始数据和哈希值作为一条消息发送。

trans-unit.source: The receiver recalculates the hash value on the received message and checks that the computed HMAC matches the transmitted HMAC.
trans-unit.target: 接收方将收到的消息哈希值重新计算，并检查计算的 HMAC 与传输的 HMAC 相匹配。

trans-unit.source: If the original and computed hash values match, the message is authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始与计算所得的哈希值匹配，消息进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If they do not match, either the data or the hash value has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果不匹配，已更改数据或哈希值。

trans-unit.source: HMACs provide security against tampering because knowledge of the secret key is required to change the message and reproduce the correct hash value.
trans-unit.target: Hmac 提供安全性，以防止篡改因为更改消息和重新生成正确的哈希值需要的机密密钥。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512> accepts keys of any size, and produces a hash sequence of length 512 bits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512> 接受任何大小的密钥，并产生 512 位的哈希序列的长度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to sign a file by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512> object and then how to verify the file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用文件进行签名<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512>对象，然后如何验证该文件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> class with a randomly generated key.
trans-unit.target: 使用随机生成的密钥初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, a 64-byte, randomly generated key is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，使用 64 字节的随机生成的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The secret key for <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> encryption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> 加密的机密密钥。

trans-unit.source: The key can be any length.
trans-unit.target: 该密钥可以是任意长度。

trans-unit.source: However, the recommended size is 128 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 但是建议的大小为 128 个字节。

trans-unit.source: If the key is more than 128 bytes long, it is hashed (using SHA-512) to derive a 128-byte key.
trans-unit.target: 如果密钥的长度超过 128 个字节，将对其进行哈希运算（使用 SHA-512）以派生出一个 128 字节的密钥。

trans-unit.source: If it is less than 128 bytes long, it is padded to 128 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果少于 128 个字节，就填充到 128 个字节。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> class with the specified key data.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的密钥数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this constructor, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用此构造函数的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512>类。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides a workaround for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] implementation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> algorithm, which is inconsistent with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 针对与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 实现不一致的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512" /> 算法的 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]实现，提供一种解决方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] applications to interact with [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] applications; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] 应用程序与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 应用程序交互，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512.ProduceLegacyHmacValues%2A> Boolean property is to enable [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] applications to interact with [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: 用途<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512.ProduceLegacyHmacValues%2A>布尔属性是启用[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]应用程序与交互[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property to `true`, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512> object produces values that match the values produced by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性为`true`、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA512>对象产生由生成的值相匹配的值[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: You should set this property only once after you create your HMAC object.
trans-unit.target: 你创建 HMAC 对象之后，你应仅一次设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: You will need to reset your key afterwards, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 你将需要重置你的密钥之后，如下面的示例中所示。
